meanings.definition: To a great extent or degree
meanings.sent1: She majorly enjoys playing the piano.
meanings.sent2: He majorly contributes to the success of the team.
meanings.sent3: The cat majorly surprised the dog by jumping out from behind the couch.
meanings.sent4: The sun majorly lights up the sky during the day.
meanings.sent5: The storm majorly flooded the streets, causing chaos.

meanings.definition: In a significant or substantial manner
meanings.sent1: She majorly improved her grades after studying hard.
meanings.sent2: He majorly helped his friend move into a new apartment.
meanings.sent3: The clown majorly entertained the children at the birthday party.
meanings.sent4: The mountain majestically stood majorly above the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The news majorly shocked the entire town.
